articles.content: At Varun Dhawan and Natasha Dalal’s wedding in Alibaug, it was not just the newlyweds who impressed us with their gorgeous outfits, the couple’s families also caught our attention by pulling off some… [+1235 chars]

articles.author: Urmimala Banerjee
articles.title: This is what Ranveer Singh told celeb mehendi artist Veena Nagda when she applied mehendi on Deepika Padukone - Bollywood Life
articles.description: After the marriage of Varun Dhawan-Natasha Dalal, Veena Nagda gave an interview where she revealed what Ranveer Singh told her at the marriage of Deepika Padukone as she did the mehendi
articles.content: Celeb mehendi artist Veena Nagda is the most sought after lady for Bollywood weddings. She was the one who did the mehendi for Natasha Dalal in her wedding with Varun Dhawan. She has shared beautiful… [+1900 chars]
